page.title: 16Hold-ups in Sidcup.
page.content: { Two violent hold-ups}by motorcycle gunmen on Friday 19th July and Tuesday 23rd July. Two men riding a single motorcycle held up{Blackfen filling station at around noon. Brandishing sawn-off shotguns thier faces hidden by helmets, they fled with two days takings. Staff although shaken were unhurt. An eye-witness described the 2 men as {medium build and height,}one wearing a red crash helmet and the other a blue one, both wearing navy blue bomber jackets. The Friday before the{Woolwich {Building Society}was raided in the same way. The gunmen fled along Sidcup High Street with about Â£1,000. { Police are appealing for witnesses who saw anything suspicious around the time of either robbery.
